EmailTemplate.subject: Your Solar Loan May Be Eligible for Co-Applicant Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for your recent BlueWave Solar Loan application. Regretfully, we are unable to approve your application at this time. Please check your inbox for an email detailing our credit check and why you were denied. However, we can reconsider your application with a qualified co-signer. To add a co-signer, click here.
If you have any questions, feel free to give us a call 844.786.4100 or email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com
Sincerely, BlueWave Customer Care customercare@bluewavesolar.com (844) 786 - 4100
